descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67561-0-1436150555.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a female follower.[/size]
[size=3]This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.


[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/503/19466904751_d06564959d_o.jpg[/img]


Name: Marcia
Level: 5 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager
Body: UNP
Weight: 0
Location: Bee and Barb, Riften
Combat Style: Dual Wielding
Perks:
Stealth, Muffled Movement, Light Foot
Silent Roll, Silence, Dual Flurry
ETC: Marriage possible, Protected


[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/551/19436556146_21d0656d5a_o.jpg[/img][/size]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url] (I recommend the 'FacelightDark Target' spell)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url] (I recommend an optional file too)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url]
